column1: The 14 regulators identified were diverse and included alternative sigma factors ( rpoS and rpoE), two - component regulators ( ompR / envZ, phoP / phoQ, and ssrA / ssrB), a response regulator for which the signal sensor is unknown ( hnr or mviA), post - transcriptional regulators ( csrA, hfq and smpB), a bending protein essential for some types of recombination ( ihf) and an assortment of other DNA binding proteins ( fruR, spvR, crp, and slyA).
